Reason: The configuration option OPTIMIZE_OR in the h2 software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value significantly impacts the query optimization process in the database system. When set to true, the system may prioritize OR operations, leading to increased execution time and potentially higher memory consumption. Conversely, setting it to false may optimize query execution by avoiding unnecessary OR operations, resulting in improved performance. Therefore, any change in the OPTIMIZE_OR configuration can have a notable effect on system performance.
